name: The Stink
description:
Movement is the arrow keys. Wolf will hunt you down unless you are in the skunk's fumes, which the wolf won't be willing to go in. Beware, the fumes will decrease your health. Unfair, you say? You can gather the acorns that appear to increase your health. When you want to leave the game, press ESC key. 

This game is a prototype, yet I wanted to upload the game for others to experience. I wanted to be able to demonstrate my growth and to show that is ok to create prototypes that never become full-length games. The music was created by Muz Station Productions. Art was created by me.
